rules.ruleString: Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {MKB2420, MKC2500, MKF2121, MKG2420, MKW2420}
Must be enrolled in course type {09, 09-4, 10, 41, 50}

description: Research methodology and analysis plays a fundamental role in problem identification, decision making, strategy development, marketing planning and the evaluation of marketing performance. Students will gain a working knowledge of qualitative research techniques. The unit is also designed to introduce students to hypothesis formulation and testing. In addition, students will explore issues associated with survey design and gain skills in basic statistical techniques used in analysing survey and experimental data.
